content:
From: d.luckhardt@posteo.de

Hi,

When I install Isabelle2025-1 under my Windows 11 Home, the first time
Isabelle opens (automatically after installation) everything is fine.
But when opening again, I am getting the error message
"[SQLITE_CANTOPEN] Unable to open the database file (unable to open
database file)". What should I do?

To mention: I tried to reinstall Isablle but could only do so as admin
(in contrast to Isabelle2025). Isabelle2025 is working fine.

Yours
Daniel

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>

On 08/01/2026 21:17, d.luckhardt@posteo.de wrote:

When I install Isabelle2025-1 under my Windows 11 Home, the first time
Isabelle opens (automatically after installation) everything is fine. But when
opening again, I am getting the error message "[SQLITE_CANTOPEN] Unable to
open the database file (unable to open database file)". What should I do?

Which installation directory did you choose?

What do you see in the Isabelle heaps directories? E.g. using the
Cygwin-Terminal with the following commands:

ls -alR "$(isabelle getenv -b ISABELLE_HOME_USER/heaps)"
ls -alR "$(isabelle getenv -b ISABELLE_HOME/heaps)"

Makarius
